website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses its competitors in almost every way – a sturdy, portable, and spacious kennel at a mid-range price.
pros: A lot to offer for around $117 – boasts solid construction that doesn't require tools to assemble
cons: Its rounded design it different that most kennels, but this is an attractive feature for many dog owners

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get any better than this
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get any better than this. I use it to hold my Cane Corso for shows. It's easy to set up and super roomy for him. Solid enough and tall enough to hold a 120lb Cane Corso. People walking by always ask about it and can't believe it is only 150 bucks. Even those flimsy folding crates cost way more! Simply awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Phantom's Ronin

customer_reviews.title: Anchors are strongly recommended if you have a robust dog
customer_reviews.text: If you happen to use this in the house and you have a muscular dog, modifications are needed. See picture, (4) 50lb weights were needed to keep my 110lb Rhodesian from moving it all around the room. Anchors are strongly recommended if you have a robust dog.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon nickell

customer_reviews.title: Nice size! Got a medium size for my GSD ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice size! Got a medium size for my GSD and she loves it even our puppy fits in there with her
customer_reviews.author: yuri cruz

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SIMPLE CONFINEMENT!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This is my 2nd one! Sets up quickly and lasts! I use for chickens mostly- just add chicken wire around the lower half with zip ties, and they cannot get out- no matter how small. Stick a piece of wood thru the cage at height preferred for an instant roost! I usually set up inside my barn, but have used outside in grass as well- Best if you move with 2 person lift- stays perfectly intact! E-Z to clean- hose off if you need to. Definitely worth the money- my first one is maybe 5 years old and in great condition! Love it! and will buy another one as need arises!
customer_reviews.author: fb

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, Horrible Cage/Kennel
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Waste of money, if you have large dogs they will jump into corners and it will collapse. Even medium dogs are large enough to fold this crap wagon in half. Came home one day to find my dog trapped in the kennel cause it broke in half at the cheap screw points, which hold the corners together. Spend the extra dollars and get a real kennel, wish I could return the broken up wagon.
customer_reviews.author: Forever99

customer_reviews.title: Too cheap, falls apart.
customer_reviews.text: I would have returned this but it was heavy and I needed something right away. It requires a solid level surface, if it does not it falls apart. Everything clips together, there is no fasteners, so if you have a roudy or smart dog they could EASILY make take the thing apart. It’s a bummer because if the thing was fastened by metal hinges It would be the best, everything is made well, but the hinges are plastic! My dog chewed through right away so we had to zip tie the thing. Plastic is never good!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Savvy

customer_reviews.title: The cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: The panels are not as wide as I was expecting but it works. I put it together by myself (with a helpful 2 year old supervising) in less than 45 minutes. It is sturdy and well made. I don't know if it would be that easy to take down and set back up every time you wanted to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and economical
customer_reviews.text: Originally used for a rabbit-not so good for rabbits as there is to large a gap between bottom pole and the ground so the rabbit can escape with just a little digging unless you fortify it. Currently using for chickens, works great. It is a very economical option that works well, would recommend. It is nicer to have full height so you don't have to bend over but six foot tall kennels are prohibitively expensive so this is a nice alternative at a much more affordable price. Oh, and I had a goat in it for a week or so. Very small goat. Worked great for the goat.
customer_reviews.author: jersey_gray

customer_reviews.title: Economical & Safe outdoor access for Pets
customer_reviews.text: The assembly went smoother than expected. I am using this on my deck so it is exposed to the elements and I have some concern about durability. It’s held together by plastic feet and tension from the canopy. After reading other reviews I decided to add 2 plastic ties to reinforce each panel connection. I was able to align the window with the window opening in my screen door which provides my cats with easy access. There is plenty of space for Cat perches and a litter box. I’ll update the post with photos soon.
customer_reviews.author: brocada

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic if you don't need to move it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a catio. It works really well and is very classy looking. Was hoping that it would be portable, which technically it is, however, getting it up and down with the shape just right is kind of a pain, and the weight is a problem. Much too difficult to do just for a weekend. I wish they made one the same 5ft width, but about half the height and weight, for cats. I like the open bottom, as my cat likes to roll in the dirt!
customer_reviews.author: SnooRay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy, high quality. No tools needed for assembly. I used in our garage as a night area for our cat (who had bathroom troubles in his older age). I had room for a full size litter box, cat bed, and a stand for food and water.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I own another one of these pet gazebos that I absolutely love. I ordered this one to extend my current one. This gazebo appeared to have been opened and taped by together. It was also missing essential parts. It was scratched in several places and did not appear to be new. I had to buy parts locally to put together as it also arrived late and I was in a crunch and had to use. I would not recommend ordering from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: AForte

customer_reviews.title: she's 65lbs & this is a perfect safe space for her while we are gone with ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog had knee surgery 8 weeks ago, she's 65lbs & this is a perfect safe space for her while we are gone with adequate room to move around so that she doesn't stiffen up. It keeps her protected from the other 2 larger dogs from rough play & I also don't have to worry about her trying to jump out it due to the roof. Not the piece of furniture I thought I would have in the middle of living room, but definitely not a complete eye sore.
customer_reviews.author: denise c ricci

customer_reviews.title: and it's the best thing we used
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews but this one deserves it. We bought it to use it when we go camping, we have 2 dogs- 75 and 20lbs. They both fit, have plenty of room, and it's the best thing we used. I wish we got it long time ago. It's durable, well made, easy to put together. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Would give it 5 stars but it was damaged during shipping...
customer_reviews.text: SIZE: MEDIUM In picture is a 30 pound corgi Aussie and 17 pound toy Aussie. The plastic piece to hold together the walls wouldn't go in the pole because it was SO bent! Material: Heavy,sturdy Set up time: About an hour Set up frustration level: 4/10 I am happy with the final set u... Would love to receive unbent wall and would be happy to then change my review to 5 stars. Overall I love it. Just nervous it would stay up due to bent pole.
customer_reviews.author: nantucket

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 large rabbit that I use this for. It has plenty of room for them to run around the top covergives them a shade spot to keep cool in the warmer months. I added a tarp around some of the sides because when it rains or snows the wind blows it inside.its very sturdy, and easy to set up, hasn't had any problems since I've had it.
customer_reviews.author: ThePanda

customer_reviews.title: picture is a little misleading
customer_reviews.text: It looks bigger with the 60 ish lb dogs in the pic. My dog is 45 lb and he looks same size in it as the dogs pictured... It works as advertised, and overall an interesting idea behind it but I do not think it will hold up long term. I am temporarily displaced and thought this would work. My dog simply prefers being closer to the house on a lead than he is in this. May work for some but like some of the reviews say for bigger dogs do not think it a good idea. Seems good quality overall... for a small dog or even lots of smaller dogs, yes!
customer_reviews.author: Dispatcher in field

customer_reviews.title: Labrador Pups Luxury Kennel
customer_reviews.text: So very happy with our "luxury kennel". Our pups are 8 months old & full of mischief when we are not home. This is a great alternative to letting them roam the backyard & chew things they should not!
customer_reviews.author: LugeniaTX

customer_reviews.title: Happy Puppy Penthouse Suite
customer_reviews.text: I have a one year old Golden Retriever that is still in the puppy zone when it comes to thinking everything he sees should go in his mouth and be reduced to small pieces or digging a whole in the yard so deep as to find ancient dog artifacts. This was the perfect alternative for having to go in his crate when I’m busy. He’s so much happier outside in the gazebo and has stopped whining while I’m busy. It went together in under 30 minutes. The walls are very sturdy and the gate works very well, especially in comparison to other pens we’ve used. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: brewclan

customer_reviews.title: I bought it to put my cats in it so ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to put my cats in it so they can have some "outside time" while I'm camping and they're not cramped in the RV all the time. It's a little small, but I can get a little kitty perch/scratcher in there. It's fairly simple to put together. It's a little heavy, but I can move it and construct it myself (I'm 5'1").
customer_reviews.author: Julie Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy duty, but easily movable when together, bought this for nineteen year old cat who has been indoor /outdoor cat all his life. He is having hearing issues and just plain old age, and I put him in this when he screams to go out, and his 5 to half hr , twice a day seems to satisfy him and I don't have to worry something bad will happen to him. He cannot get out but he is adult cat. Would NOT recommend for a kitten as they might be able to get out at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: Requires perfectly flat ground for proper assembly and fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and joined them together. Overall quality is more than acceptable, although the latch is pretty wimpy. Another weakness are the clips for the fold down access panel, extremely under-built for anything more than a chuhuaua. As the title states, these require extremely flat ground in order for everything to fit well. The canopy cover is actually pretty nice, and the ball ties work, with a little practice. All told, I give them a solid 80%. I can see them lasting at least a decade with regular use, so long as the latch and door clips hold up to my 100# bulldog/shorthair mix and 50# pit mix.
customer_reviews.author: Chris (Michigan)

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Pet Gazebo! We have had ours for 8 months now. We have two dogs (blk lab & pit mix) and they are very comfortable in it when we are camping. Set up is pretty easy. In the bag it is quite heavy so I suggest help when lifting. My lab is pretty smart and knows how to open the door latch so we just got a small clip to go through the hole where you would put a lock. If you wanted a bigger area then get a second gazebo. They are modular so you can combine two.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie S.

customer_reviews.title: My husky loves it
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, it way bigger than I expected it and most importantly my dog loves it. It took me maybe 20 mins to put together. Honestly it is higher quality than I expected it. I’m happy I bought this. Looks great in the back yard too. Loved the double sides covering
customer_reviews.author: Gisell Langelier

customer_reviews.title: Great Kennel
customer_reviews.text: Gazebo is much steadier than I imagined it would be. Very easy to put together. I do worry about the connectors being plastic, but so far I haven't had an issue. Was able to set this up on my own. I do not see this being a "portable" kennel as it is very heavy to be moving around even when taken apart. Would be great for small dogs or maybe medium sized dogs. Large dog would be okay, but not for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlinn

customer_reviews.title: Its super well designed and made and large enough for him ...
customer_reviews.text: my dog absolutely loves this gazebo. Its super well designed and made and large enough for him to move around. Easy instructions to put together. My only nit pick are the plastic connectors. Some fit perfectly and some don't. Also the window holders were placed backwards on mine but i turned them around. Overall I like it no complaints besides those little imperfections I could live with.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: So cute & sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This pet gazebo is such a stylish way to keep pets contained! I have one in my front yard to house my two laying hens and it looks adorable! The directions state you can also attach two of these together, which I"m sure would look even more adorable! These are heavy duty and I'm sure paintable when the time comes. I will be using these in lieu of the flimsy wooden chicken coops from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Door Gap Too Wide
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised that there is a two inch gap at the bottom of the door. Would make sense to have it fit. Trying to find something to fill the gap. My 5 month old Chihuahua is able to get her head in it just enough to get stuck. Appears to be a real danger of strangulation. I rate OK because otherwise it is fine, it is just a bit expensive to require modifications to make it safe.
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: This kennel is awesome. It fits both our large dogs (one is ...
customer_reviews.text: This kennel is awesome. It fits both our large dogs (one is 95lbs, one is 85lbs). They have plenty of room to wrestle or lay down. It's sturdy although we ended up zip tying the panels together for extra reinforcement. We haven't traveled with this yet, and it would take up a lot of space in the suv but still think it a worth-it investment even without traveling. I would definitely purchase this again. ***The only thing I don't like is that this kennel started selling for $30 cheaper than what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Bphlow

customer_reviews.title: 55lbs, easy assembly, big enough for a large Dog
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. I would recommend working the bottoms first, we put together three on the bottom, followed by the top and so on. Don’t put the top caps until all the bottom are attached. Takes about 5 mins to put together. Will get faster the more we do it. The picture is the day it arrived in our Living room. With our 85 lb German Shepherd and 20 Lb Cairn Terrier. We purchased this for our RV and used it on our first camping trip this past weekend. Only negative the little ball straps for the top cover could be a little bit longer. It is 55 lbs, but if moving it gate by gate no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli L. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Overall the product was great (at first)
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product was great (at first). The manufacturer decided to use "plastic" clips to hold the gates together. Do the math... Dogs+Plastic = ..... I imagine they did this to increase their profits, with replacement parts. My Brittany Spaniel was able to chew these plastic pieces until she ultimately broke out of the kennel, and destroyed over $300 of items in my garage, including the sheetrock. I advise to stay way from this product, or if you buy this product, be ready to improvise.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor confinement of dogs.
customer_reviews.text: The gazebo can be set up indoors, giving dogs more room than a crate but confining them to just part of a room. The top of the gazebo took me a long time to put on. Perhaps it is easier with two people. My dog has been using the gazebo for almost 3 years and it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: ELM

customer_reviews.title: Great shelter!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked for kitties and rescue pups. It is sturdy enough to withstand an active litter of pups. It is easy to put together or take apart by one person - if that person knows how to do it. It has withstood a snowfall and ice storm, even the cover. I am definitely impressed! I would like to say though that dimensions can be deceiving. It might be 5 foot in the center, but I am 5'2" - and I think I would be hard put to stand up even halfway in it. But a full grown large dog can stand up in it easily, and a medium size kitty condo can be placed inside with several friendly kitties.
customer_reviews.author: Aset

customer_reviews.title: Ok but wish I didn't buy
customer_reviews.text: Of you have a smart dog, this pen will be destroyed day one. My Labradoodle had the room ripped off and the support bars bent within a couple of days. The support bars are pretty flimsy metal and are what keep the whole integrity of the pen in tact. This would be great for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Talon

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Much sturdier than I had expected. We staked it to the ground for a permanent dog yard. Shorter than I was expecting but works perfectly for what I need. Easy assembly took about 20 minutes, easy to do alone.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for the purpose of keeping both my English ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for the purpose of keeping both my English cocker spaniel and dashound locked up while I'm at work. I gave in a 3 bc I feel like this picture is false advertisement this obviously is the large cage and not the medium which they are selling. Yes the cage is small good for the kind of dogs that I have but not for a large breed let alone two large breeds. The box has a picture of one golden retriever on it but honestly it's to short and small to keep a large dog like that in. Advise if your shopping for a large breed get the large for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Baes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 70 lb shepherd mix so we can take her camping with us and have a place to keep her safe and away from other campers while we are busy or when she needs some down time. I put her bed in it and she loves it. I bought the hook on stainless steel water/food bowls and it makes a nice setup. Very pleased with the design and strength.
customer_reviews.author: Takemetothebeach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cage!
customer_reviews.text: We have two dog's that we take camping with us. This is the perfect cage for us. We can set it up fairly quickly and it gives them a space outside without having to be on a leash all of the time (rules of campgrounds). They don't get tangled and they can play with their toys! I do not recommend to use as a daily outdoor kennel while away due to not anchoring down. Such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, very spacious and easy to set up in less than 15 minutes once you get the hang of it. 5 minute or less break down which makes it very portable. Side panels (sold separately) are a nice addition and further stabilizes the entire structure. Yorkie loves it and plays for hours with his toys inside without whining or barking for attention constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! Small door is perfect for our bunny's.
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. My 16 year old daughter put it together with just a little help from me; need two people for a little bit. She did it in about 20 minutes. We bought it for our two French Lop bunny's. I like how it has a little pet door. We connected an x-pen to it, so the buns have more room to run in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional addition to my yard.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Keeps my fur babies safe outside. Very nice looking and functional. I have it set up in my front yard with a bistro set and some flowers and it actually adds to the curb appeal of my house instead of looking like a cage. I connect a play yard to it for more romping room for them when I’m out working in the yard and having my coffee but I like that I can put them inside and know they’re safe from the hawks looming in the trees (my girls are tiny Lhasapoos). I would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: RE Barreto

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my golden retriever for night time kenneling and it is so nice and roomy she loves it and will even go get in it and lay in it with the door open during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Rs12

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my sons Flemish giant rabbit. It works great. The top piece is a sturdy canvas that seems like it will last and the side panels are sturdy. The down side is when moving it to fresh grass it comes apart easily and requires putting the pieces back together after moving it.
customer_reviews.author: Heyhay

customer_reviews.title: Check measurements, more than one size.
customer_reviews.text: Fast ship, high quality materials, reasonable time and effort to assemble. The only regret was that we didn't check measurements, would have preferred next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Omg the dogs love it! It was so easy to put together I had no problem at all! As you can see my dogs are tiny so they have plenty of space to walk around in! I mainly got it so they won't get dirty! They do have white fur so it's just hard to maintain when they love dirt! Pet safe grass turf will be added into this! The little window in the side is great and the door is perfect! Took me about 45 mins to put together of course I looked at the instructions a good amount of time to make sure I put it together perfectly. I love it and my dogs love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sosa_2692

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, effective and great looking kennel
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these now. One is stand-alone and the other two are connected using the corridor option. The unit is fairly heavy on its own, but my mutts figured out how to get a nose under a panel and get out, so I tied it down with the Abba Patio 18lbs steel weights on a bungee cord at 4 corners and they have given up trying to play Houdini since then.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: gazebo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 Pomeranians and it is the best thing for outside I could have bought them. This is very sturdy and good quality. I live in the country and wanted something that would fit on my deck that would keep them safe from any predators. I can easily see them almost at all times because it sits right in the front of my family room. The only downside I had was the little part that pulls open towards the top was not made as well. Kind of hard to pull open and close but not bad. My dogs both absolutely love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: panda29

customer_reviews.title: Cage good. Cover Bad.
customer_reviews.text: Not difficult to assemble. Spaces at the bottom, so had to put rocks around the bottom so bunny couldn't go under. But the cover had little holes and tears which I covered with duct tape. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these connected together as our chicken run. We love it, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was fantastic, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for 6 chicks as a temporary nursery, it was fantastic, great purchase. I love how easy it was to put together, and with the storage bag I will have it ready for the next set of chicks come spring. I would be large enough for both of my dog's also, I have a english bulldog and a boxer, both loved to check it out. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anja

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have a 60/70 lb german shepherd and this product was a waste of money. she was able to separate the panels and get out the second time I used it. if you have a larger dog, don't waste your money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Hiogh Quality Kennel
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy and well made. The Aztec Gold is a very good color, although there were a few paint chips on the powder coat. Kennel arrived in two days, even though indication was that it would take three days. I'm pleased with this purchase and consider the product to be a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: It does not stay together well. If you move it slightly to cut the grass under it, it completely pulls apart. The top of it was so hard to put together that we ended up leaving it off. I wish i would have purchased a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy for me (62 yr old female) to put together. I was able to drag it to various nearby areas of the lawn, as long as I dragged it on the grass. Used it while my dog was under 3 month heartworm treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Savstone

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase of this item; worth your money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using one at my kennel for a couple years. I just purchased another to use at my home. It is worth the money. Both the play pen and canopy top are good quality materials, and it is well built. There is a side shade you can put on, but I haven't used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for our camping trips - Fits our three dogs comfortably - Easy to set up and take apart -
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for our camping trips - Fits our three dogs comfortably - Easy to set up and take apart -
customer_reviews.author: Sav65

customer_reviews.title: Kinda' cheap to put together my dog is gentle so it might have lasted for me but for someone with a more jumpy dog might get torn up easily.
customer_reviews.text: Was way too small for what we needed. Kinda' cheap to put together my dog is gentle so it might have lasted for me but for someone with a more jumpy dog might get torn up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Shosh Hacha

customer_reviews.title: Great Gazebo for our little dog!
customer_reviews.text: I assembled it in 30 minutes. Easy to assemble. The tarp cords are the hardest item to put on. The side door needs better latches! I put zip ties on it to secure it shut for good. Or until the dog chews them off and tries to escape. I will likely put a metal clip on that door very soon! My biggest worry is the dog digging under the panels. I ordered a set of 8 metal ground stakes on Amazon. This will help with heavy winds (if any) and hopefully deter digging.
customer_reviews.author: Cyborg2

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great! Easy to assemble! Used for Newfoundland for short periods, works great
customer_reviews.author: Linder

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Works great, especially in area with no fences, kept my dogs safe
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: I’d definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 5’ size gazebo for my 65 lb. pit bull, Frankie. He seems to love it especially since we added indoor/outdoor carpeting and placed it on the patio. After only a few days, he had his first nap in it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha N.

customer_reviews.title: This is so perfect!! We have a seasonal campsite and take ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect!! We have a seasonal campsite and take our dog. This makes a safe comfortable place for while still outside with us.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It's not good for big dog and item is waste of money ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not good for big dog and item is waste of money plzzz dot waste your time and money on it
customer_reviews.author: Nayab Qayyum

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I set this gazebo up just outside of the pet door at my sliding glass door so my dog would have access to the outside and my cat would also be able to go outside into a safe confined, dry area. It was easy to put together, I did it myself without assistance. I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Once this is put together, it's very stable. You might want to put some stakes into the ground to keep the wind from blowing it over or a big dog from moving it but otherwise, it's a great investment for your pet. I'm using mine for a couple chickens to go out during the daytime...you can hang a nest box from the window. I'll be buying a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Mynx H.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed for our chocolate lab. She is 10 weeks and there is plenty of room for growth. We have the ability for her to be outside in the fresh air but contained. We can also move it around between patio and grass.
customer_reviews.author: Froschy

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a fabulous find for my cats and dogs; keeps them right where I need them when outside for fresh air; big roomy and durable. love it.
customer_reviews.author: sharebare38

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: OK first of all I didn't buy this for my dogs, it was purchased for my cockatoo as an outdoor bird cage. After I tweaked it a bit ( put caging on the top so she can't fly away) it was perfect. But aside from that it is built very well and over all is very attractive. I would not recommend it for a large or even a med size dog but would be perfect for a small dog the tarp that came w it is an average tarp but is a good one. assembly was supper easy and fast and would be easy to take apart just as quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Easy to Set Up! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Love This! Bought it for my daughter to use when she bought a new house that did not have a fence. It was easy to put up, and her dogs love it. Even now, after a new fence for the yard was installed, her dogs still love to lie down in the Pet Gazebo & enjoy its shade.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Everything I'd hoped it would be!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my goldens because I've been working longer hours lately and felt Terrible about leaving my competition dogs in their travel crates for 7/8 hours at a time. The size is exactly as appears in the photo, assembly was a breeze, and it has plastic feet so I didn't have to worry about finding a way to protect the floor from scratching. I placed cinder blocks around the outside edges so it won't slide if they lean or bump into the sides and it's been a total success; it's perfect for dogs who are well crate trained!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Celeste Longstaff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome worked put perfect for camping every one was asking where we got ours plenty of room for the dogs 0didnt have to worry about kids or other dogs coming around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Just bought for our pups to replace some bent up kennels. Setup is extremely easy. Have it indoors to secure 4 pups while we are not home. Looks like it's gonna a be a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy, it requires no tools to put together and is of great quality. The top is made of a tap material and is totally reversable. One side is a dark brown and the other is white. It's larger than I anticipated and dog loves it. She is blind and needed a place that she could be outside but not vulnerable to predators ad she is only 7 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jayboo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase!! Easy set up in our family room to manage our standard poodle puppy during the day if we have to go out. Be sure to follow all directions as tent dome must be put on for stability! It is on a wood floor....had to put little pieces of non skid rubber for under rugs under the feet....so it would not slide....this worked perfectly....rock solid. Life saver for managing new puppy and large enough that it would be very comfortable for a very large dog...ie 75 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T.

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed! Will withstand the Oklahoma wind and protect our new puppy from aerial attacks when going potty outside. Took about 45 min to put together by myself
customer_reviews.author: Melwick8

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to assist with the two new Golden Retrievers we brought home as puppies and it even allows for the elevated dog bed to fit inside and still allow room for bowls toys and a little room for the pups to move around and romp. Comes in very handy during the puppy stage!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The kennel is very sturdy and is very easy to put together as well ...
customer_reviews.text: The kennel is very sturdy and is very easy to put together as well as take down and reassemble if necessary. I would recommend this if you have one dog and as a temporary keep. Not much room left if you have a dog house you would like to keep in the kennel for long periods of keeping. I had to return mine as it was too small for what I was intending to use. But overall it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: James A Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Good pet gazebo
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble. My dog doesn't really care for it and it is really hard to get her into it (even with treats), but other than that it works just fine. I live in Seattle and it has held up in the rain so far.
customer_reviews.author: Don D

customer_reviews.title: Durable Pet Kennel
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this dog kennel, very easy to put together, very durable, to be honest I did t think it was gonna be so durable! Very good price for product would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: CAP

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Probably the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Probably the best on the market. Well constructed! I have a small dog and it works perfect. I don't know how it works with bigger dogs. I suppose that a big dog could tip it over because it doesn't weigh much. Might need to put some tie downs in that case. I personal love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: " but it snapped together like a dream and is very secure
customer_reviews.text: I was suspicious about "no tools required," but it snapped together like a dream and is very secure.. As to the height, be aware that the metal is only 40" high, so you're not going to walk in it, but is lightweight enough to pick up one side and move it to clean up the area underneath. The sun cover adds to its strength and shields the sun nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Oberembt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I go camping (tent camping) a lot and have a very active German Shorthair Pointer that goes with me. Sometimes I need some space and he needs some space where he's not confined to his crate. This fit the bill perfectly. Right size, easy to transport and I have the Tote for it as well so it stows nicely. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Four large dogs pictured (60-90 pounds)
customer_reviews.text: Great so far we love the concept and construction quality. Unit is slightly larger than expected. Cat mode is great for outdoor time for indoor cats.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Mayer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for dogs...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put up the gazebo today and it’s just what we were looking for. It the perfect size for our Jack Russell and Terrier Poodle dogs. Very easy to put together and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Murray

customer_reviews.title: Will not work for labs!
customer_reviews.text: So sturdy and very well made. Not practical for 2 labs or even one as the picture leads you to believe. It is way too small for my dogs!! So just make sure you pay attention to measurements. But so well made and this size would be perfect for smaller breeds.
customer_reviews.author: ZebraCakes911

customer_reviews.title: I will say if you do not have a perfectly flat surface it will cause some "flowery" language when you are trying to put it all t
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for our new puppy and he loves it. I will say if you do not have a perfectly flat surface it will cause some "flowery" language when you are trying to put it all together but overall it seems like a nice product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for all of our pets!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our border collie and chihuahua to do their business in and it's a perfect size! It is also just right for our cats to hang out in without being able to escape! Keeps them in the shade so they can munch on fresh grass and get fresh air!
customer_reviews.author: Max Calder

customer_reviews.title: Really nice kennel.
customer_reviews.text: It fits our rat terrier and cockapoo when we are outside in our pool or just outside enjoying the day. Otherwise, we don't use it. I couldn't imagine keeping any dog in it for a long period of time. We do have to use a bicycle chain lock on it, though. Otherwise our rat terrier could unlatch the door. He's quite tall for a rat terrier and can jump pretty high, too.
customer_reviews.author: TinaF1971

customer_reviews.title: We live in southern California so weather was good when I had to leave him in it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my German Shepherd after ACL surgery. I had to lock him up for 9 weeks only letting him out to potty. I used this as an outdoor crate and put him in it for 3 hours while I was at work. That way he could potty and not have to hold it while I was gone. We live in southern California so weather was good when I had to leave him in it. This is large enough to hold both my dog's comfortably. It folds up great and is perfect for the outdoors. It's powder coated and very well made. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amnixt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our two pets! A medium size dog and a little dog. Enough room to stretch, easy to put together and not too big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pet spa
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly as a place for our pet to stay when we weren't around. Plenty of room and a much nicer place to relax vs. a small kennel cage. Nicely made and easy to put together, and later take down when we didn't need it any more. Glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: med1pilot

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: amazing and easy to put up!! we are a sanctuary and this is great to use when we have to separate cats when they have colds or are new and must be separated for 2 weeks - plenty of room to play!!
customer_reviews.author: nancy b. sayle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice item. Used for our few chickens. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it, easy to assemble and keep on had ...
customer_reviews.text: love it, easy to assemble and keep on had for church picnics in the park, or when our children bring their dogs to our house and the dogs need to be contained around our BBQ grill; I especially like the sturdy cover against too much sun or rain
customer_reviews.author: Violet Kasa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! .. best purchase for my dog when I have to be away from him. Easy setup, sturdy, roomy. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Iva McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Durable Gazebo
customer_reviews.text: I liked this gazebo. It has been very useful with my litter of Rottweiler puppies. It will be useful for my Min Pin as well. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Broadie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Was amazed at quality of product & ease of putting up. Very spacious & great to place on deck. We use it to let dogs & cat sit with us & relax after they take a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Seguin

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Don’t like moving it and would be a pain to take down but it’s nice with the shaded cover.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, very stable, easy to set up, easy to move, looks great, my lab is now 5 months, 40lbs. She has lots of room. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Boese

customer_reviews.title: Best pet kennel deal, and it's portable!
customer_reviews.text: The Advantek pet gazebos are the best deal for an outdoor pet kennel, and it works great for our two border collie puppies. We built a dog house that sets up against the window on the gazebo and it works great, the puppies like their new home. I love that you can get a tote for the medium gazebo so we can take it on our trips to visit family. The larger size would be good for bigger dogs, and nice for the owner's back during cleaning and feeding times.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

product_meta.title: Advantek Pet Gazebo Outdoor Metal Dog Kennel with Reversible Cover, 5 Foot
product_meta.description: Give your dog the luxurious outdoor lifestyle they deserve. With the 5' Pet Gazebo, your best friend will be protected from the elements while relaxing in style. The gazebo offers a unique 60 inches x 60 inches x 60 inches octagonal design and is built with sturdy steel construction which is powder-coated in Advantek’s patented AztekGold durable finish. The kennel is simple and easy to put up in under 10 minutes without using ANY tools. Since its introduction the Pet Gazebo has become widely accepted as the most travel friendly complete pet kennel on the market today. Its compact design and quick and easy set up makes it perfect for camping, hunting, fishing trips, vacations and more! Buy multiple gazebos and easily connect them to each other with no additional parts to create your own design! There's no limit to the things you can do with your Pet Gazebo.
feature_bullets: Includes One (1) 5 ft Medium Open wire gazebo made from galvanized steel for your pet with a newly designed umbrella roof frame with no tools needed
Includes weather resistant polyethylene reversible cover that protects your best friend from the elements and lets them comfortably relax in style
Use your Pet Gazebo Outdoors as an X-Pen or Kennel - for Pets to 80 pounds.
Compact, sturdy and portable so it's perfect for vacation, fishing, camping and traveling and keeps your pet safe, secure and happy
Has many great accesories available to cater to your pet's style while complimenting and enhancing any outdoor setting
